[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/framework/src/lib.rs] [Module: release_bundle] [Multi-step proposal bypass] Can attackers manipulate next_execution_hash in generate_script_proposal_multi_step() to bypass proposal execution order and deploy malicious upgrades? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/framework/src/lib.rs] [Module: release_bundle] [Testnet-only bypass] Can generate_script_proposal_testnet() be exploited to deploy testnet code to mainnet by manipulating is_testnet parameter or environment detection? (High)
